name: Orrimaarko
content:
Orrimaarko was a male Dressellian who served the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War against the Galactic Empire. Shortly before the Battle of Endor, in which the Alliance attacked the Empire's DS-2 Death Star II Mobile Battle Station superweapon above the moon of Endor, he attended a meeting on board the MC80 Star Cruiser Home One to plan the battle. He had light brown skin and black eyes, although one was covered by an eye patch.
Orrimaarko first appeared in Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi played by Colin Hunt. His 1984 action figure was labeled "Prune Face," the only name the character had until Pablo Hidalgo dubbed him Orrimaarko in Galaxy Guide 12: Aliens â€” Enemies and Allies a Star Wars Legends sourcebook by West End Games released in 1995.
The 2018 reference book Star Wars: Alien Archive states that Orrimaarko was a member of the Endor strike team during the Battle of Endor. In the 2019 novel Resistance Reborn, however, in conversation with Leia Organa Orrimaarko specifically states that he did not fight on the ground during the battle.
